name: Drew Smith
text: Usually go to the Pizza Hut in my town but decided to try this one out for the lunch buffet. Upon arriving the server got our drinks quick and was super attentive and friendly. Other staff was great as well with keeping fresh pizzas out. Salad bar had a good variety and place was clean. Will definitely be coming back.

name: Laura C
text: Fast.  Old building.  Seemed reasonably clean.  Takeout was very good.  Staff were very friendly and helpful.  Price was best in town.

text: Good food but all the tables were dirty and they sat us at a dirty table, didn't bother to clean it.

name: rberry wraps
text: The past several times we ate here the salad bar was picked thru and had to frequently ask for items be replenished.   The Tuesday buffet is a hit...miss on if they keep up with fresh pizzas.  They could definitely use another server to come and check your table or refill your drinks.

name: Steve Holmes
text: We are sadly just outside the delivery zone, so we frequently do carry out. We always have great service and good food at this location.

text: Place could use an update bathrooms small and dirty, lights above tables filthy. UPDATE carpet it's filthy. Staff was very friendly and courteous. Typical Pizza Hut Great food just the establishment needs an update.

name: S Lawrence
text: Trying to compete with Little Caesars they offer a 5 dollar pizza.  They have very little toppings, very little cheese, frozen pizza would have been better.  I called ahead 30 minutes.  When I arrived they told me sorry, they forgot to press complete on my order so they didn't make it.  Had to wait another 20 minutes.
